response.job_title: Civil Engineer | Graduate Degree in Management | Associate in Operations at McKinsey & Company
response.summary:
I have experience in project planning and management, proficiency in five languages, excellent communication skills, rapport with stakeholders and resources administration. Good leader and team player.

I am passionate for discovery and new challenges. I am decided to overcome barriers and always looking for growth and innovation. I am responsible, organized and proactive.
response.skills: Gestión de proyectos, Análisis de riesgos, Resolución de problemas, Planificación de proyectos, Coordinación de proyectos, Control de presupuestos, Construcción, Infraestructura, Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, Microsoft Project, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Trabajo en equipo, Gestión de la cadena de valor, Comunicación oral y escrita asertiva, Gestión de grupos de interés, Liderazgo de equipos multidisciplinarios, Aptitudes de organización

profile_positions.description:
PROJECT:
Comprehensive structuring of the following roads: 1. Bogotá – Bucaramanga, 2. Bucaramanga – Pamplona, 3. Duitama - Pamplona – Cúcuta, 4. Norte De Santander, 5. Transversales Cusiana - Carare – Boyacá, 6. Manizales - Honda – Villeta, whose total distance is 2.200 Km.

ACTIVITIES:
- Leader of the technical structuring coordination team.
- Optimization of activities.
- Billing and successful collecting.
- Activities planning and monitoring.
- Financial flow supervision.
- Communication with stakeholders.
- Problem solving.
profile_positions.title: General Coordinator of the Technical Area

company.name: McKinsey & Company
company.description:
McKinsey & Company is a global management consulting firm. We are the trusted advisor to the world's leading businesses, governments, and institutions. 

We work with leading organizations across the private, public and social sectors. Our scale, scope, and knowledge allow us to address problems that no one else can. We have deep functional and industry expertise as well as breadth of geographical reach. We are passionate about taking on immense challenges that matter to our clients and, often, to the world. 

We work with our clients as we do with our colleagues. We build their capabilities and leadership skills at every level and every opportunity. We do this to help build internal support, get to real issues, and reach practical recommendations. We bring out the capabilities of clients to fully participate in the process and lead the ongoing work.
